scripts.publish:client:patch: cd dist/client && npm version patch && npm publish --access public
scripts.publish:client:minor: cd dist/client && npm version minor && npm publish --access public
scripts.publish:client:major: cd dist/client && npm version major && npm publish --access public
scripts.publish:next:patch: cd dist/next && npm version patch && npm publish --access public
scripts.publish:next:minor: cd dist/next && npm version minor && npm publish --access public
scripts.publish:next:major: cd dist/next && npm version major && npm publish --access public
